4f5e41a9-4512-4821-bc7d-9a649ac858a2.description: Earners of the Road Design Modeling Accreditation have demonstrated the skills needed to effectively use OpenRoads (or OpenRail) Designer CONNECT Edition software in a design environment. Earners are able to create horizontal, vertical, and offset geometry; create a corridor with template drops, superelevation, point controls, and parametric constraints; calculate earthwork, create drawing sheets, and more.
4f5e41a9-4512-4821-bc7d-9a649ac858a2.name: Bentley Accredited Road Designer: Road Design Modeling with OpenRoads Designer

alignments.name: This credential is equivalent to 8 Learning Units
alignments.description: Learning Units are PDHs – Professional Development Hours, which are self-reported. Bentley awards one Bentley Institute Professional Development Hour for every hour spent learning.

badge_template_activities.title: Complete Bentley training courses or self-study training
Pass the skills assessment quiz with a score of 80% and above
Receive approval on submitted roadway design project files
Acquire real-world road design experience using Bentley OpenRoads Designer

91a68d24-516f-4af8-81c0-52106e2d7fae.description: Bentley Accredited MicroStation User is a skilled user who has demonstrated the required knowledge covering a variety of basic 2D MicroStation skills and commands. This candidate will be effective and proficient at using MicroStation and has successfully passed an online self-assessment. The assessment covers a range of commands and skills, including, drawing creation, creating accurate geometry, use of text, cells, levels, references, creating sheets and sheet indexing, and printing.
91a68d24-516f-4af8-81c0-52106e2d7fae.name: Bentley Accredited MicroStation User

badge_template_activities.title: Complete Bentley training courses or self-study training.
Acquire real-world use and experience using Bentley MicroStation software.
Pass the assessment exam with a score of 75% or higher

ffe9dc8e-af93-459f-a239-59c86d925557.description: Accredited Professionals have verified successful use of MicroStation in a provided sample project. They have demonstrated the knowledge and skills required to effectively use MicroStation in a production environment, becoming proficient by learning Bentley recommended best practices and workflows. They have leveraged their abilities by creating accurate geometry, editing and manipulating geometry, applying annotation, creating details, defining sheet composition, the Sheet Index, and printing.
ffe9dc8e-af93-459f-a239-59c86d925557.name: Bentley Accredited MicroStation Professional

badge_template_activities.title: Complete Bentley training courses or self-study training.
Acquire real-world use and experience using Bentley MicroStation software.
Completed, submitted, and received approval on an example design project using modeling, drawing techniques, and best practices learned throughout the course and accreditation project.

7336af92-0458-4e97-8b54-cd6773402e4e.description: Earners of the Bentley Accredited Developer: iTwin Platform, Associate Level will understand the basic principles and components of developing software applications using the iTwin Platform. The iTwin Platform is a collection of APIs and cloud services for building digital twin applications for infrastructure assets. Badge holders have shown competency in understanding concepts including data synchronization and federation, visualization, and querying iTwin data.
7336af92-0458-4e97-8b54-cd6773402e4e.name: Bentley Accredited Developer: iTwin Platform - Associate

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Bentley Accredited Developer: iTwin Platform - Associate Level training course
Pass the assessment exam

f166d65f-3210-44fd-ad07-400455b06955.description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated the fundamental core skills as it relates to the roadway design tools in the OpenRoads Modeling Workflow. Earners have shown fundamental knowledge in the following software categories: Interface, Terrain, Geometry, Superelevation, Corridor Modeling, Template Creation, Civil Cells, Drawing Production, and Earthwork.
f166d65f-3210-44fd-ad07-400455b06955.name: Bentley Accredited Road Modeler: OpenRoads Modeling Core Skills

alignments.name: This credential is equivalent to 1 Learning Units
alignments.description: Learning Units are PDHs – Professional Development Hours, which are self-reported. Bentley awards one Bentley Institute Professional Development Hour for every hour spent learning.

badge_template_activities.title: Review the recommended OnDemand self-paced courses
Acquire real-world experience with OpenRoads Designer software.
Pass the skills assessment quiz with a score of 75% and above

f4e4efab-8914-4a9e-a966-be2acd193382.description: Earners of the Bentley ProjectWise Administrator Accreditation have developed the necessary skills to effectively manage a configured project. They are capable of defining the Users, Groups, and Access Lists, creating a new environment and define its attributes, manipulate ProjectWise Explorer at an Administrator-level, setup the ProjectWise Workflow, and define the security schema for the project.
f4e4efab-8914-4a9e-a966-be2acd193382.name: Bentley Accredited ProjectWise Administrator

badge_template_activities.title: 300 hours of ProjectWise usage at any level

1- Attend 16 hours of live hands-on classes with Bentley Consultant. 2- Complete all the exercises delivered during the classes, which includes defining access lists, creating a new environment, manipulating ProjectWise Explorer, creating the ProjectWise Workflows, and defining the security schema.
Complete the assigned project assignment within 2 weeks after the course completion.

4823bfee-577f-444e-b210-2c59d663009b.description: Earners of the Bentley OpenRoads Designer Premier Scholar Accreditation have demonstrated expertise, vast product knowledge, and advanced design modeling proficiency by participating in and completing a technical Bootcamp focused on OpenRoads Designer and consisting of best practices, case studies, and advanced design modeling problems.
4823bfee-577f-444e-b210-2c59d663009b.name: Bentley Accredited Premier Scholar: OpenRoads Designer

badge_template_activities.title: The organization must have an Enterprise License Subscription (E365 Premium)
User is selected by the Organization to participate
User and Organization agrees to the Terms and Conditions of the Premier Scholar Program
Bentley Accredited Road Modeler: OpenRoads Modeling Core Skills
User participates in the Workshop and passes the Capstone portions of the Premier Scholar Program

b52269f6-a282-41eb-bd49-43858c1c1d2c.description: Earners of the Bentley Accredited BIM Modeler: Basic Structural Modeling with OpenBuildings have developed the entry level skills needed to effectively use OpenBuildings Designer to model the primary structural elements of a building and generate basic structural drawings. They have shown competency in skills such as placing steel and concrete columns and beams, slabs and footings, assembling a federated building model and creating a structural framing plan and section.
b52269f6-a282-41eb-bd49-43858c1c1d2c.name: Bentley Accredited BIM Modeler: Basic Structural Modeling with OpenBuildings

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the OnDemand introductory training for Bentley Accredited BIM Modeler: Structural Modeling with OpenBuildings

Complete the OnDemand training for Building QuickStart Structural Bundle: - BIM QuickStart S101: Modeling StructuralFrames - BIM QuickStart S102: Modeling Slabs and Foundations - BIM QuickStart S103: Creating Structural Drawings
Acquire real-world use and experience using Bentley OpenBuildings Designer software.
Completed and submitted for approval a structural model and drawings for a 3 story commercial building using the modeling and drawing techniques learned in the required training.

6354fcb0-e4a6-46d8-8105-7c5e56817fcb.description: A Bentley Institute Product Training Partner, provide necessary skillset and knowledge to professionals and students for optimal use of Bentley technology. Bentley Institute Product Training Partners are to help users and enthusiasts with hands-on training and guidance on the products locally and timely. Attuning to changing user and industry requirements is an attribute of our Training Partners.
6354fcb0-e4a6-46d8-8105-7c5e56817fcb.name: Bentley Institute Product Training Partner

badge_template_activities.title: Has to be a registered business firm with verifiable tax credentials and credit profile
Must have qualified trainers on requested products, duly evaluated by Bentley Experts

8788b341-319c-4a33-b238-abeab0ce9edd.description: Earners of the Basic Bridge Modeling Accreditation have demonstrated the skills needed to effectively use the modeling capabilities of OpenBridge Designer or OpenBridge Modeler CONNECT Edition software in a design/project environment. Earners are able to reference OpenRoads geometry and terrain data or import geometry and ground data from other solutions, create a 3D model of a precast concrete and steel I-girder bridge, and produce 2D plans sheets for bridge superstructure and substructure.
8788b341-319c-4a33-b238-abeab0ce9edd.name: Bentley Accredited Bridge Modeler: Basic Bridge Modeling with OpenBridge Modeler

badge_template_activities.title: Complete Introduction to OpenBridge Designer/OpenBridge Modeler training or self-study training
Acquire real-world experience with OpenBridge Designer or OpenBridge Modeler
Pass the skills assessment quiz with a score of 75% and above

ee698604-e92c-444f-9515-8cab3ac2fa8a.description: Earners of the Bentley Accredited BIM Modeler: Basic Architectural Modeling with OpenBuildings have developed the entry level skills needed to effectively use OpenBuildings Designer to model the primary architectural elements of a building and generate basic architectural drawings. They have shown competency in skills such as placing walls, doors and windows, assembling a federated building model and creating an architectural floor plan and building section
ee698604-e92c-444f-9515-8cab3ac2fa8a.name: Bentley Accredited BIM Modeler: Basic Architectural Modeling with OpenBuildings

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the OnDemand introductory training for Bentley Accredited BIM Modeler: Architectural Modeling with OpenBuildings

Complete the OnDemand training for Building QuickStart Architecture Bundle: - BIM QuickStart A101: Modeling Walls, Doors and Windows - BIM QuickStart A102: Modeling Interior Floors - BIM QuickStart A103: Creating Architectural Drawings and Schedules
Acquire real-world use and experience using Bentley OpenBuildings Designer software.
Completed and submitted for approval an architectural model and drawings for a 3 story commercial building using the modeling and drawing techniques learned in the required training.

e494c151-99c3-43e8-98ae-ef396f82e6f4.description: Earners of the Bentley Accredited BIM Modeler: Basic Mechanical Modeling with OpenBuildings have developed the entry level skills needed to effectively use OpenBuildings Designer to model the primary mechanical elements of a building and generate basic mechanical drawings. They have shown competency in skills such as placing ductwork, diffusers and grilles, assembling a federated building model and creating a mechanical floor plan and section.
e494c151-99c3-43e8-98ae-ef396f82e6f4.name: Bentley Accredited BIM Modeler: Basic Mechanical Modeling with OpenBuildings

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the OnDemand introductory training for Bentley Accredited BIM Modeler: Mechanical Modeling with OpenBuildings

Complete the OnDemand training for Building QuickStart Mechanical Bundle: - BIM QuickStart M101: Modeling Equipment and Ductwork - BIM QuickStart M102: Modeling Diffusers, Grilles and Branches - BIM QuickStart M103: Creating Mechanical Drawings
Acquire real-world use and experience using Bentley OpenBuildings Designer software.
Completed and submitted for approval a mechanical model and drawings for a 3 story commercial building using the modeling and drawing techniques learned in the required training.

4dec33aa-4321-4e71-9964-0fbb4f435e1f.description: A Bentley Qualified Trainer affiliated with a Bentley Institute Product Training Partner has demonstrated the proficiency and mastery of training MicroStation. A Qualified Trainer can cater to the training requirements of different users varying from beginner to advanced levels. Earners of this badge have been evaluated on their proficiency, knowledge, and delivery skill. Trainer fulfills all program requirements of Bentley Qualified Trainer.
4dec33aa-4321-4e71-9964-0fbb4f435e1f.name: Bentley Qualified Trainer - MicroStation

badge_template_activities.title: How to become a Bentley Qualified Trainer for MicroStation?
Successfully clear an online proficiency assessment on MicroStation.
Complete a project with defined task and requirements on MicroStation, reviewed by Bentley Product Expert.
One to one Interview with Bentley Expert to demonstrate the required product knowledge and delivery skills.

e4dad898-876a-4c99-b70f-8af91e692f6a.description: Earners of the Bentley OpenBuildings Designer User Accreditation have showcased they have the essential OpenBuildings Designer software knowledge to work effectively in a design environment. They have demonstrated the required knowledge covering basic OpenBuildings Designer 3D modeling skills and an understanding of Building Informational modeling.
e4dad898-876a-4c99-b70f-8af91e692f6a.name: Bentley Accredited OpenBuildings Designer User

badge_template_activities.title: Complete Bentley training courses or self-study training.
Acquire real-world use and experience using Bentley OpenBuildings Designer software.
Pass the assessment exam with a score of 75% or higher

b0328490-66f4-4184-9f39-3fd0dd5b7f72.description: Earners of the Bentley Accredited BIM Modeler: Basic Electrical Modeling with OpenBuildings have developed the entry level skills needed to effectively use OpenBuildings Designer to model the primary electrical elements of a building and generate basic electrical drawings. They have shown competency in skills such as placing an electrical panel, arranging light fixtures and modeling raceways, assembling a federated building model and creating an electrical lighting plan.
b0328490-66f4-4184-9f39-3fd0dd5b7f72.name: Bentley Accredited BIM Modeler: Basic Electrical Modeling with OpenBuildings

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the OnDemand introductory training for Bentley Accredited BIM Modeler: Electrical Modeling with OpenBuildings

Complete the OnDemand training for Building QuickStart Electrical Bundle: - BIM QuickStart E101: Design File Setup and Symbol Placement - BIM QuickStart E102: Symbol Arrangement and Raceways - BIM QuickStart E103: Generating Drawings and Reports
Acquire real-world use and experience using Bentley OpenBuildings Designer software.
Completed and submitted for approval an electrical model and drawings for a 3 story commercial building using the modeling and drawing techniques learned in the required training.

0ed2fe0a-efdc-4421-b42a-f3544fd4dc22.description: Earners of the SYNCHRO 4D Professional accreditation have the working-level skills to effectively use SYNCHRO solutions on a construction project. They are competent in skills such as creating 4D/5D models, digital QTO, construction projects & field data management using SYNCHRO products.
0ed2fe0a-efdc-4421-b42a-f3544fd4dc22.name: Bentley Accredited SYNCHRO 4D Professional

badge_template_activities.title: At least 3 months of professional experience in using SYNCHRO software
Complete SYNCHRO 4D Learning Path on LEARNserver
Pass the assessment exam with a score of 75% or higher

3599a005-9f17-4331-8c55-8ab0184412ad.description: A Bentley Qualified Trainer affiliated with a Bentley Institute Product Training Partner has demonstrated the proficiency and mastery of training OpenRoads Designer. A Qualified Trainer can cater to the training requirements of different users varying from beginner to advanced levels. Earners of this badge can be entrusted upon by organizations and individuals who wish to learn a product from scratch or want to upgrade their current skillset.
3599a005-9f17-4331-8c55-8ab0184412ad.name: Bentley Qualified Trainer - OpenRoads Designer

badge_template_activities.title: How to become a Bentley Qualified Trainer for OpenRoads Designer?
Successfully clear an online proficiency assessment on OpenRoads Designer
Complete a project with defined tasks and requirements on OpenRoads Designer, reviewed by Bentley Product Expert.
One to one Interview with Bentley Product Expert to demonstrate required product knowledge and delivery skills.

36b4d8d5-cab5-41d2-bb6f-585cb811c42f.description: A Bentley Qualified Trainer affiliated with a Bentley Institute Product Training Partner has demonstrated proficiency and mastery of training SYNCHRO 4D. A Qualified Trainer can cater to the training requirements of different users varying from beginner to advanced levels. Earners of this badge have been evaluated on their proficiency, knowledge, and delivery skill. Trainer fulfills all program requirements of Bentley Qualified Trainer.
36b4d8d5-cab5-41d2-bb6f-585cb811c42f.name: Bentley Qualified Trainer - SYNCHRO 4D

badge_template_activities.title: How to become a Bentley Qualified Trainer for SYNCHRO 4D?
Successfully clear an online proficiency assessment on SYNCHRO 4D.
One to one Interview with Bentley Expert to demonstrate the required product knowledge and delivery skills.

3ac436b8-2a92-483c-a46e-d96671d3e152.description: Earners of the Bentley Accredited BIM Modeler: Computational Design Modeling accreditation have developed the entry-level skills needed to effectively use OpenBuildings GenerativeComponents software in the design of a building massing model. They are competent in skills such as creating a parametric stacking model with adjustable floor planes, using variables to control geometric forms and creating a generated node type to be applied to a curvilinear surface.
3ac436b8-2a92-483c-a46e-d96671d3e152.name: Bentley Accredited BIM Modeler: Computational Design Modeling with OpenBuildings GenerativeComponents

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the OnDemand training for Bentley Accredited BIM Modeler: Computational Design Modeling with OpenBuildings GenerativeComponents

Complete the OnDemand training for Building QuickStart for GenerativeComponents Live Bundle: - Building QuickStart GC101: Creating a Massing Model - Building QuickStart GC102: Creating a Stacking Model - Building QuickStart GC103: Spaces and Grids - Building QuickStart GC104: Creating a Curved Facade - Building QuickStart GC105: Creating a User-Defined Node Type
Acquire real-world use and experience using Bentley OpenBuildings GenerativeComponents software.
Completed and submitted for approval a paremetric stacking model based on an assigned design problem using the computational design techniques learned in the required training.

b09b4156-0e05-4925-a9cf-76fdee128fa7.description: A Bentley Qualified Trainer affiliated with a Bentley Institute Product Training Partner has demonstrated proficiency and mastery on training ContextCapture. A Qualified Trainer can cater to the training requirements of different users varying from beginner to advanced levels. Earners of this badge have been evaluated on their proficiency, knowledge, and delivery skill. Trainer fulfills all program requirements of Bentley Qualified Trainer.

Complete a project with defined tasks and requirements on ContextCapture, reviewed by Bentley Product Expert
One to one Interview with Bentley Expert to demonstrate requierd product knowledege and delivery skills

7c943b49-1965-4f73-9360-342daca8ebbf.description: A Bentley Qualified Trainer affiliated with a Bentley Institute Product Training Partner has demonstrated the proficiency and mastery of training OpenBuildings Designer. 541bd9dd-dc32-4138-b07e-bd2b17f725ab.description: A Bentley Qualified Trainer affiliated with a Bentley Institute Product Training Partner has demonstrated proficiency and mastery in training OpenFlows WaterGEMS. A Qualified Trainer can cater to the training requirements of different users varying from beginner to advanced levels. Earners of this badge have been evaluated on their proficiency, knowledge, and delivery skill. Trainer fulfills all program requirements of Bentley Qualified Trainer.

6d094cc9-9e86-4259-94d5-023f221c737c.description: The iTwin Platform is a collection of APIs and cloud services for building digital twin applications for infrastructure assets. Earners of the Intro to iTwin APIs learning badge will understand the basic concepts and principles of using iTwin platform APIs to build digital twin applications. Badge holders have shown competency in understanding topics including API documentation and tools, authentication, making iTwin platform requests, debugging, and more.
6d094cc9-9e86-4259-94d5-023f221c737c.name: Bentley iTwin Learning: Intro to iTwin APIs

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the iTwin Developer Accreditation: Intro to iTwin APIs – Course
Pass the assessment exam

c143c6f0-9d72-4d4a-b0a2-a57d7202be56.description: Earners of the BCDE Information Provider badge have a fundamental understanding of the BCDE environment. Badge holders can independently interact with a BCDE system and have demonstrated over a sustained period of time the ability to upload and issue documents and manage their own tasks.
c143c6f0-9d72-4d4a-b0a2-a57d7202be56.name: Bentley Accredited BCDE Information Provider

badge_template_activities.title: Acquire 50 hours of real-world experience with the BCDE software.
Complete the BCDE Information Provider eLearning course
Pass the BCDE Information Provider online assessment

93d20b45-25fb-4b04-8489-ddb8ff62d596.description: A Bentley Qualified Trainer affiliated with a Bentley Institute Product Training Partner has demonstrated proficiency and mastery in training OpenFlows SewerGEMS. A Qualified Trainer can cater to the training requirements of different users varying from beginner to advanced levels. Earners of this badge have been evaluated on their proficiency, knowledge, and delivery skill. Trainer fulfills all program requirements of Bentley Qualified Trainer.
93d20b45-25fb-4b04-8489-ddb8ff62d596.name: Bentley Qualified Trainer - OpenFlows SewerGEMS

Successfully clear an online proficiency assessment on OpenFlows SewerGEMS
Complete a project with defined tasks and requirements on OpenFlows SewerGEMS, reviewed by Bentley Product Expert
One to one Interview with Bentley Expert to demonstrate required product knowledge and delivery skills

2db5d8e0-0076-44c9-828d-056157b53235.description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated their knowledge and expertise as Distinguished educators. As Educator, they have been recognized for their ability to effectively transfer skills and knowledge so that the recipient is able to apply the skill in a specific situation or leverage the materials presented.
2db5d8e0-0076-44c9-828d-056157b53235.name: Bentley Education: Distinguished Educator

badge_template_activities.title: Create posts in Bentley Educator Communities channel.  OR
Share their inspiring information on infrastructure expertise in the Bentley Education portal.  OR
Deliver a presentation on any two Bentley technologies

63512547-62fd-4b95-aa05-0c6f65cf32da.description: The iTwin Platform is a collection of APIs and cloud services for building digital twin applications for infrastructure assets. Earners of the Property Validation API learning badge will understand the basic concepts and principles of using the Property Validation API to check if the properties of elements in a digital twin meet the requirements of a project, organization, or user. Badge holders have shown competency in understanding topics including the property validation workflow, and more.
63512547-62fd-4b95-aa05-0c6f65cf32da.name: Bentley iTwin Learning: Property Validation API

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the iTwin Developer Accreditation: Property Validation API – Course
Pass the assessment exam

b4de4c68-919b-4bd9-bea0-1a776a5a7ccb.description: The iTwin Platform is a collection of APIs and cloud services for building digital twin applications for infrastructure assets. Earners of the Synchronization API learning badge will understand the basic concepts and principles of using the Synchronization API to transform engineering data into the iModel format used by the iTwin Platform. The API can update new and existing iModels based on changes to source data in a variety of engineering design formats.
b4de4c68-919b-4bd9-bea0-1a776a5a7ccb.name: Bentley iTwin Learning: Synchronization API

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the iTwin Developer Accreditation: Synchronization API – Course
Pass the assessment exam

9700a5c0-dad0-4c4d-bc2e-49394390a0a4.description: Earners of the Bentley Education recognized future professional badge are students who have showcased effective skills required to use STAAD.Pro. They have completed a series of guided learning paths and completed an assessment connected to key student learning outcomes.
9700a5c0-dad0-4c4d-bc2e-49394390a0a4.name: Bentley Education: Recognized Future Professional - STAAD.Pro

badge_template_activities.title: Must be a student enrolled in any of the Undergraduate/Post-graduate courses
Complete the profile in the Bentley Education portal and download Bentley STAAD.Pro software.
Complete the guided learning paths available for Structural Analysis on STAAD.Pro
Complete the assessment with 80% or more score

b95728ea-96a4-4e8c-bc26-73c36fe877f7.description: A Bentley Qualified Trainer affiliated with a Bentley Institute Product Training Partner has demonstrated proficiency and mastery in training Orbit 3DM. A Qualified Trainer can cater to the training requirements of different users varying from beginner to advanced levels. Earners of this badge have been evaluated on their proficiency, knowledge, and delivery skill. Trainer fulfills all program requirements of Bentley Qualified Trainer.
b95728ea-96a4-4e8c-bc26-73c36fe877f7.name: Bentley Qualified Trainer - Orbit 3DM

badge_template_activities.title: How to become Bentley Qualified Trainer for Orbit 3DM?
Successfully clear an online proficiency assessment on Orbit 3DM
Complete a project with defined task and requirements on Orbit 3DM, reviewed by Bentley Product Expert.
One to one Interview with Bentley Expert to demonstrate required product knowledge and delivery skills.

67f215b9-5031-4d73-a4d2-8aba8540f215.description: A Bentley Qualified Trainer affiliated with a Bentley Institute Product Training Partner has demonstrated proficiency and mastery in training PLAXIS LE. A Qualified Trainer can cater to the training requirements of different users varying from beginner to advanced levels. Earners of this badge have been evaluated on their proficiency, knowledge, and delivery skill. Trainer fulfills all program requirements of Bentley Qualified Trainer.

One to one Interview with Bentley Expert to demonstrate requierd product knowledege and delivery skills

86bcf3f1-ff8e-4e3e-a4ff-ce7e4c7161eb.description: This badge recognizes an individual student’s achievement as a learner, inspiring other students to develop their skills so that they can be better prepared for a career in the infrastructure industry. These students have gained acumen in leadership, developed the ability to confidently perform Bentley Education activities, and contribute to an engaging Bentley Student community.
86bcf3f1-ff8e-4e3e-a4ff-ce7e4c7161eb.name: Bentley Education: Influential Student

badge_template_activities.title: Complete their profile in the Bentley Education Portal
Start FIVE conversations on Bentley Student Community forums
Complete the first challenge within one month
Answer to 2 questions on the different forums of the Bentley Student Community
Show off your Projects in Bentley Student Community forums

5bb99023-97f8-4a78-a148-74cfd3817772.description: The Badge is an acknowledgment for teachers successful in using Bentley technology to create learning environments that empower Middle school, Secondary school, and High school students to be independent and creative learners, build reading and STEM skills, and prepare them for their futures steps. This badge recognizes secondary & high school teachers who demonstrated major accomplishments in preparing their students for education and careers in Infrastructure Industries
5bb99023-97f8-4a78-a148-74cfd3817772.name: Bentley Education: Innovative Teacher

badge_template_activities.title: Use of Bentley technology and solutions to bring innovation in explaining concepts, improving teaching methodologies, visualization of objects, and hands-on practical session for better realization of concepts & ideas.

6adc51a9-fa27-43ba-a9ae-ad1ac55736ee.description: Earners of the Bentley Education recognized future professional badge are students who have showcased effective skills required to use ContextCapture. They have completed a series of guided learning paths and completed an assessment connected to key student learning outcomes.
6adc51a9-fa27-43ba-a9ae-ad1ac55736ee.name: Bentley Education: Recognized Future Professional - ContextCapture

badge_template_activities.title: Must be a student enrolled in any of the Undergraduate/Post-graduate course
Complete the profile in the Bentley Education portal and download Bentley ContextCapture software.
Complete the guided learning paths available for Reality Modeling on ContextCapture
Complete the assessment with 80% or more score

c6227413-5fea-4929-a621-46fe63bfc754.description: Earners of the Bentley Education recognized future professional badge are students who have showcased effective skills required to use OpenRoad Designer. They have completed a series of guided learning paths and completed an assessment connected to key student learning outcomes.
c6227413-5fea-4929-a621-46fe63bfc754.name: Bentley Education: Recognized Future Professional - OpenRoads Designer

badge_template_activities.title: Must be a student enrolled in any of the Undergraduate/Post-graduate courses
Complete the profile in the Bentley Education portal and download Bentley OpenRoads Designer software.
Complete the guided learning paths available for Highway Engineering and Road Design on OpenRoads Designer
Complete the assessment with 80% or more score
